Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration of its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a discounted rate, ensuring you receive maximum value for your investment. I am confident that you will find this product to be an invaluable asset. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
